guidelines.title: Optimize Images
guidelines.description: Use compressed images and modern formats (like WebP) to reduce file sizes and decrease load times, ultimately lowering energy consumption.

guidelines.title: Enable Lazy Loading
guidelines.description: Implement lazy loading for images and videos to ensure that resources are only loaded when they enter the viewport, reducing unnecessary data transfer.

guidelines.title: Minimize HTTP Requests
guidelines.description: Reduce the number of elements on a page to minimize HTTP requests, leading to lower energy usage during data transmission.

guidelines.title: Use Efficient Coding Practices
guidelines.description: Write clean, efficient code and minimize the use of heavy libraries to reduce the computational load on servers.

guidelines.title: Leverage Caching
guidelines.description: Utilize browser caching to store frequently accessed resources locally, reducing the need for repeated server requests.

guidelines.title: Implement Content Delivery Networks (CDNs)
guidelines.description: Use CDNs to distribute content closer to users, which can reduce latency and energy consumption during data delivery.

guidelines.title: Use Green Hosting Services
guidelines.description: Choose hosting providers that use renewable energy sources to power their servers, significantly reducing the carbon footprint of your website.

guidelines.title: Reduce Animation and Effects
guidelines.description: Limit the use of heavy animations and effects, as they can increase CPU usage and energy consumption on user devices.

guidelines.title: Audit Your Site Regularly
guidelines.description: Perform regular audits using tools like Google Lighthouse to identify areas for optimization and track improvements in performance and emissions.

guidelines.title: Educate Users on Sustainability
guidelines.description: Provide users with information on how they can contribute to reducing CO2 emissions through their digital behavior and choices.

guidelines.title: Implement Dark Mode
guidelines.description: Encourage the use of dark mode on your website to save energy on OLED screens, reducing overall power consumption.

guidelines.title: Optimize Server Response Times
guidelines.description: Reduce server response times by optimizing your backend processes and databases, which can lower energy usage during data retrieval.
